reviewText: My sister got me hooked on McLeod's Daughters when she was stationed overseas and sent me Season 1 after she watched it.  Growing up in farm & ranch country, it was easy to become attached to the characters and what they went through.  There are some differences in equipment and problems that they face since the show is from Australia and since it's television, but overall it's fairly authentic and the characters are believable.  Season 3 was excellent.  It was a bit more complex than the previous 2 seasons, building and expanding, giving the characters and relationships more depth.  As in all television shows, some of the relationships end (sometimes tragically) and new ones begin.

Mcleod's Daughters is a show I first saw on WE- After it ended,I was heartbroken not to see how things continued-well, it has been sometime since then and thank you to YOU TUBE, I have been able to keep up with my girls in Australia-Season 3 is a MUST HAVE-from Claire's pregnancy,thru Seeing Lights with the birth of Charlotte and Tess's exciting adventure in the grain silo to the SO SAD My Noon,My Midnight episode-I cried for days and then found relief with "Goodbye"-This series is one that encompasses all in human nature with excellent acting,beautiful scenery,and the hope for another day. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!Check it out from the start-you won't be sorry!

First.. I hope that the "29 episodes" listed above is wrong because I seem to recall that there were 30 episodes to this series (this being the first series that they had 30+ - series 4,5 and 6 all had 32 - right?).  This to me is the best series of the 6 that I have seen.. One of so much joy (esp.. Claire and Alex) and so much sadness [I have yet to get through "My Noon, My Midnight" and "The Long Goodbye" without crying - it was a good thing Lisa and Aaron won the Logies that year (unfortunately Bridie was nominated against Lisa - they should both have won..)].  I am anxiously awaiting series 3 to dvd and the rest of them.. I can't watch my Aussie copies here in the states (which has been released to series 6) and I am really missing the show! Such a spectacular show!

I caught this series in the middle of series 2. I watched it to the end of series 3, when WE stopped carrying it.
I purchase series 1 from amazon, and it is very good, because it is about the girls and the ranch and daily travails.
Later in the series, boyfriends and whatnot intrude and it becomes more complicated. I am hoping to buy series 4 someday, but it is being released very slowly. They are finished with series 7 in Australia, so we are behind.
Highly recommended for moms, daughters, and anybody who loves Australia.

Mcleods Daughters is by far the most entertaining show I have ever had the pleasure to watch. It has wonderful relationships between brothers and sisters, and just friends. It is about 5 women running a ranch in australia. It tells of good times and bad. This show will make you laugh and it will make you cry.

All around good family fun..

A beautiful series about women working together on a cattle station in Australia.  Forget the glamor and perfect looks of Hollywood, Australian television is gritty with everyday people.  A must view as it has a great storyline and the added attraction of the rugged Australian countryside.
What will these Aussie do next?
best ever
Definitely a chick series and the outback scenery is beautiful.
IHave enjoyed watching all 8 season on Netflix on TiVo, but bought this season (one of my favorites, to give as a gift to my mother.

Love this show!  Now have all 8 seasons, though Season 1-3 are still the best.  Good family entertainment about people who love to work on the land and will do what it takes to keep the homestead.  Camaraderie and commitment.  A wonderful mx of drama and comedy and the music written specifically for the storylines is excellent.  Ya can't miss...Enjoy!
Another awesome season of MD - wishing Claire ( Lisa Chappell) would stay and Stevie would also be a regular
I am always impressed with the fast, great service I always get on Amazon. The Mcleod's Daughters season 3 is wonderful.
Awesome series!  Have been a fan for years.  WB only ran first 3 seasons.  Had to purchase so I could watch the rest!

Someone needs to tell the author that black baldies have to have an Angus X.  Not Hereford to Hereford.  Other than that, it is still a fun series.
I am very glad to be able to watch the series, since our Cable dropped the coverage.
I love the McLeod's Daughters series. The 3rd season is one of the best as some major events happen in it that influence the rest of the seasons.
Enjoyed this season the most as it was the last one I got to see on TV when it was shown here.

This series is addictive. Four families are sharing it.
All follow it with great expectations.
Writers are devious and talented.
I LOVE THIS SHOW.. I DID NOT LIKE IT WHEN CLAIRE GOT KILLED SHE AND TESS ARE GREAT.. LOVE LOVE LOVE IT
I discovered this series when I was stuck in the hospital for over a month so i'm very happy amazon has it
My daughter and I love this show.  The bond between sisters, hard work, ethics and values portrayed; such a nice change from the typical shows on television in the U.S.
Nice to see the series without commercials. Nice to know I can eventually purchase all and have for viewing anytime.
I love this series.  Purchased the complete set and am very pleased with it.  Would recommend this to others that like ranch life and beautiful scenery.
The purchase was made only because Blockbuster had most of the 3rd season unavailable to rent.  It was a season not to be missed and worth the money to have it to view when I wanted to.

watch it all the time i laugh,cry.and flow with show  you really have to start at the being of the series and then you can understand it better.
to bad it had to end in series eight.  it was wonder full series
I have to say that this was the most exceptionally written program that I have every watched.  The writers and the actors and actresses wrote and acted  life so well of so many people.  Thank You.

Everything about McLeod's Daughters is wonderful. I grew up living this lifestyle and this TV series is very true to life in many ways (as much as it can be with actors who probably never grew up living this life but did a wonderful job).
I HAVE ALL THE SEASONS NOW AND EVERY ONE IS GREAT. LOVE THIS SERIES. DVDS ARE REALLY GOOD. BUY AND ENJOY
Me and my daughter just can't get enough.  We watch one episode every day.  I think this season is worth every penny.

I am sure this DVD is just fine. I wouldn't know because I didn't open it. I bought it for a giftee who already found it elsewhere. I contacted you and have heard nothing. Please contact need to return this item.

I was introduced to the series when I visited South Australia. I was so happy to be able to purchase it here. I love the story and the scenery. The acting is excellent. I have almost the whole series. It was filmed in the area I visited so I have a definite connection. I got so involved with the characters that I cried when Claire got killed. I felt as though I had lost a member of the family. I can recommend the series to anyone who enjoys a good story about sheep ranching,romance,Australia,horses and cattle.

I just love this show. First saw it when visiting family in New Zealand recently, couldn't get enough of it. When I returned to USA I brought the DVD's through Amazon. There's no hype and glamor no rich and famous..just real down to earth country girls making an honest living on a cattle ranch in Australia. Each day is different and keeps you wanting to go back to see what's coming up next! I just love the characters..the cast is brilliant! Look forward to sharing this with family and friends..beats anything else on TV today!!! Dunno what I'm gonna do once I'm through all the episodes! [probably start over].

My wife is hooked on McLeod's Daughters and is completely satisfied with this method of viewing! She first got hooked when it was on one of our U.S. cable channels, but it was dropped after the 3rd season. Then there seemed to be issues getting the acceptable DVD format for US players. Finally, all the seasons are available and she can get her "fix!" For my wife, this series is #1 and she does not watch other soaps. For U.S. viewers: if you remember "Dallas", then McLeod's Daughters is an Australian production of similar proportions, but more believable. This series is well acted & well done! Some will find this priced expensively, but the price per episode would be similar to Itunes' prices and there is no puzzle for me in shopping for a present for my wife! A+++++
I just can't get enough of this show, it is one of the few shows that my family watches over and over again.

Season 3 of Mcloud's Daughter's has been an emotional roller coaster from the beginning.  I have been so captivated by the characters and storyline of this show from the first episode in the first season. I've gotten so involved that I can't wait to get home and see the next episode.  What a fun storyline, I love how two sisters reunite after so many years apart.  I love watching the struggles of living on a farm and dealing with day to day life, the financial difficulties, the demanding tasks, relationships that start, end and form through different trials and demands of life.
Season 3 has been the most emotional season yet, I didn't think my heart could make it through to the end of the season.  I'm not sure how the story is going to go next...
There were so many things that happened in Season 3, I laughed so many times and cried just as many. There were so many hopes and dreams of the future but now everything seems to be in the air and unsettled.  I couldn't believe the outcome of the last few episodes and I was very sad to see how everything was played out.  But am hopeful to see what life brings for Drover's Run in the coming seasons.
I LOVED the first two seasons, it was so refreshing to see a show that was different than everything else out there on TV...it was only by chance I came across this show and now I'm addicted!  I've recommended it to all my friends and family and many of them are now addicted as well!  I'll definitely see the coming seasons but am a little worried that they are going to turn into a soap and loose the effect they have now.
It's been great to escape to Drover's Run when life get's too crazy or I need a break...I love just catching an episode here and there or sitting down for a whole day and watching for hours upon hours!! I definitely would recommend this to anyone and am sure they would become an avid Mcloud's viewer!

Season 3 Wow what an emotional ride.  Saying good by to some very good friends will leave you heartbroke but hopeful with the arrival of new faces, not to replace the old ones but to show when a door is shut a window is opened.  A wonderful closure in the last epi's, beautifully done.
I have loved the series when we could watch in the US.  It a great drama about women making it on a Austrial ranch.  Love, birth and heart break.

Koch Vision presents "MCLEOD'S DAUGHTERS: THE COMPLETE THIRD SEASON" (Released: 2003) (1291 mins/Color) (Dolby Digital) --- McLeod's Daughters is an Australian television drama set in the rural outback --- This release presents all 30 episodes from the third season of MCLEOD`S DAUGHTERS. Claire (Lisa Chappell) and Tess (Bridie Carter) are the two daughters of the title --- The McLeods have been brought together after a long period of separation, thanks to their joint inheritance of Drover`s Run, a cattle farm that has been in their family for many generations. Together, the two gather an all-female group of workers to keep the place going --- The show creates some admirably strong, inspirational female characters, and builds its original premise into well-crafted storylines.

FEATURES ALL THIRD SEASON 30 EPISODES:
McLeod's Daughters: Widescreen Format)
1.  Fairy Tale, Ending
2.  Better the Devil You Know
3.  The Road Home
4.  An Affair to Forget

28. My Noon, My Midnight

30. Turbulence

McLeod's Daughter's is an original Australian TV show, with high quality writing, acting and scenery --- completely character driven, exceptional stories about people --- script is very unique in content a big spread run by 5 women --- our series is about two half sisters, separated as children who reunite as adults to jointly work the family ranch after the parents have all died --- The country girl Claire who grew up on "Drovers Run" is trying to make a go of it --- the city girl Tess arrives on the scene expecting to collect her inheritance in cash --- Tess now learns the realities of cash strapped ranching, as she reconnects with both her sister and the land where she was a young child --- We are introduced to the other residents of Drovers Run, through Tess' eyes --- Witness her warm and outgoing personality wins over the viewer as easily as anyone on the show --- Thrown together after 20 years apart they pull together an all female workforce --- with an abundance of heart and humor, commit to an extraordinary life at Drovers Run,

Great job by Koch Vision --- looking forward to more high quality titles from the BBC Collection film market --- order your copy now from Amazon or Koch Vision where there are plenty of copies available on DVD, stay tuned once again for top notch releases --- where they are experts in releasing long forgotten films and treasures to the collector.

Total Time: 1291 mins on DVD ~ Koch Vision ~ (8/14/2007)

I loved the first two seasons, but in this season the show is starting to slide into soap opera.  Several of the plot twists are pretty obvious devices to maintain romantic tension.  People get over one another pretty quickly and move on to their next relationships, in ways that no longer seem credible and real.  Although there are still some humorous episodes to keep the series interesting, it's a real shame that the writers focused so heavily on the romance at the expense of the bigger stories of these interesting women coping with ranch life in the Australian outback.

This was an excellent DVD selection. The disc were all complete and great. They were just as I had remembered on the McLeod's Daughters TV show, that was cancelled in the USA after the third season.  Have already ordered and and received the 1st & 2nd season disc and will order the 4th season next.  Amazon was prompt in getting this out to me and offered a good price. Customer service was great.  Will order other selections from Amazon in the future.
Great 3rd season. Can't wait for Season 4. If you haven't seen this series you should.
This is one of the best series I have ever watch. It's addictive.

I got hooked whatching the show when it was on WE.  I love that I can watch all the episodes with no intruptions now and on my time.  I love the fact that its about these women running a property in Australia and you see all the hard work, challenges they encounter, and the love they have for each other.  I just love the show.
I wish this program was still on in the US, but since it isn't, it's a great excuse to have to own it!

Season Three of McLeod's Daughters brings more heart-warming stories, a deepening of relationships, and unexpected tragedy.  The stories are told in such a way that you feel like you are right there with the characters, like you are a part of their close circle of friends feeling what they feel.  I thoroughly enjoy the series and each person that I have shown the DVD's to now considers him/herself a McLeod's Daughters fan.  It is a show for men and women of all ages who enjoy animals, rural life,  independence and family.
This show is better than anything on TV in the US.  I love the characters the actors do excellent jobs.  The landscapes are gorgeous.  Quality is the best way to describe this show.
good movies
Hooked on the series!!!! Cried like a baby when we lost Claire.
Excellent!!
Love love this show. DVDs were great
Loved this series!
Super great
Very Well Done TV Show from Southern Australia. JWH
so sad that all the seasons are not available. but a great series if you can find them.
Good packaging, good timing on shipment, product as described. I'm satisfied with the order, thank you!
great
